dialogue.text: Channel 42... This is Enzync City's very own news network. You're watching EnZ-TV. Today's top story:
Following recent public backlash, CEO of the GlazeCorp comglomerate, Glaze the 11th, announced today in a public statement that he will be stepping down.
"It's become clear that in my age, I've lost sight of what we stand for here at GlazeCorp. Upon reflection, I no longer see myself fit to maintain the good will of our company."
"I will be stepping down from my position, and in my stead, new younger blood will fill my shoes to lead GlazeCorp into a more acceptable future."
Following this statement came the announcement that the former CEO's son will be filling his role as CEO of GlazeCorp.
We come to you live from outside GlazeCorp's Enzync City offices to speak with the new CEO on what his plans on taking the corperation forward will be.
What's good, Enzync? It's about time this channel aired something worth watching!
I hear this city is supposed to be "Culture Capital Number 1", so let's put some merit to that claim!
And what better than havin' your very own rising stars here to remind you what it's all about?
